bus.description: North Shore Meditation Centre is conveniently located in the Lane Cove Village near the Lane Cove Library, within easy walking distance from the Lane Cove Interchange.
bus.title: Taking the Bus?

driving.description: There are more than 1,000 free parking spaces around the centre in the Lane Cove Village, making it an easy place for anyone in the North Shore, Hills districts, and Ryde areas to learn TM. We recommend parking at the Lane Cove Market Square Carpark.
driving.title: Driving?

remote.description: We also support keen learners and TM meditators from the Central Coast, Newcastle, Northern Beaches, and Blue Mountains. Contact us to find out how you can be supported.
remote.title: Can't Come to Us?

centre.title: At the Centre of the North Shore

grace.imageAlt: A photo of grace laughing happily
paragraphs: Grace is a former urological surgeon who has dedicated her career to medicinal research and global pharmaceutical development. Now at her Transcendental Meditation® (TM) Centre in Lane Cove, she draws on her wealth of corporate experience and personal journey to guide others towards finding balance and peace.

With over 3 decades in the pharmaceutical and clinical research industry, Grace has lived and worked in countries such as China, Australia, Japan, Germany, and Singapore, where she held global and regional leadership responsibilities. Over time, she became increasingly aware of the importance of holistic well-being in health practices, prompting her to reflect deeply on her own work and experiences.

After trying to find other ways of settling her mind for more than 10 years, Grace discovered that TM not only gave her the inner peace she needed, but also significantly increased her self-awareness and expanded her counsciousness. This profound shift brought her tremendous benefits in her personal and professional development that goes beyond health.

Grace would like to see more and more people learn this simple technique that has benefited her tremendously. At her centre, she offers a warm and welcomign space where individuals can learn this effortless practice and meet with other like-minded meditators.

Whether you're looking to reduce stress, find your inner peace, improve focus, develop your leadership qualities, or enhance your overall well-being, you'll find a supportive environment with Grace - someone who truly understands the balance between corporate, life damands, and the joys of life.
grace.title: Meet Dr. Grace Pei: Founder of Lane Cove's Transcendental Meditation® Centre

aboutUs.subtitle: Discover the story behind Grace, our centre, and our commitment to bringing inner peace to our community.
aboutUs.title: About North Shore Meditation

paragraphs: Transcendental Meditation (TM) is more than just a relaxation technique — it's a journey rooted in one of the world's most ancient traditions. Developed from the thousands-of-years-old Vedic wisdom of India, TM offers a simple and effective way to experience profound inner peace and clarity.

TM as we know it today was introduced to the world by Maharishi Mahesh Yogi in the 1950s. Inspired by the rich spiritual teachings of the Vedic tradition, Maharishi developed a technique that allows anyone, regardless of background or lifestyle, to access a deep state of restful awareness.
origins.title: Origins of the Transcendental Meditation® Technique

chart.title: Effects of TM on High Anxiety Individuals

citation.name: Orme-Johnson, D. W., Barnes, V. A., Travis, F., & Wallace, R. K. (2014).Orme-Johnson, D. W., & Barnes, V. A. (2014). Effects of the transcendental meditation technique on trait anxiety: a meta-analysis of randomised controlled trials. Journal of alternative and complementary medicine (New York, N.Y.), 20(5), 330-341.

cards.description: Research shows that TM significantly reduces stress and anxiety by lowering cortisol levels, which is a hormone associated with stress.
cards.title: Reduction of Stress and Anxiety

citation.name: Schneider, R. H., Grim, C. E., Rainforth, M. V., Kotchen, T., Nidich, S. I., Gaylord-King, C., Salerno, J. W., & Kotchen, J. M. (2012). Stress reduction in the secondary prevention of cardiovascular disease: Randomised, controlled trial of Transcendental Meditation and health education in Blacks. Circulation: Cardiovascular Quality and Outcomes, 5(6), 750-758.

cards.description: TM has been shown to help with heart health by lowering blood pressure, reducing the risk of heart attacks, strokes, and other cardiovascular issues.
cards.title: Improved Cardiovascular Health

citation.name: Travis, F., & Arenander, A. (2010). Cross-sectional and longitudinal study of effects of Transcendental Meditation practice on interhemispheric frontal coherence and cognitive development in university students. Cognitive Processing, 11(1), 21-30.

cards.description: TM can improve cognitive functions, including focus, memory, and decision-making. Studies suggest that TM increases brain coherence, which relates to improved learning abilities and intellectual performance.
cards.title: Enhanced Brain Function and Focus

chart.title: Effects of TM on PTSD in Veterans

citation.name: Rosenthal, J. Z., Grosswald, S., Ross, R., & Rosenthal, N. (2011). Effects of transcendental meditation in veterans of Operation Enduring Freedom and Operation Iraqi Freedom with posttraumatic stress disorder: a pilot study. Military medicine, 176(6), 626-630.

cards.description: TM has been shown to be effective in reducing symptoms of post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), particularly in military veterans.
cards.title: Reduction in PTSD Symptoms

chart.title: Change in cortisol during TM Practice

citation.name: Jevning, R., Wilson, A. F., & Davidson, J. M. (1978). Adrenocortical activity during meditation. Hormones and behavior, 10(1), 54-60. https://doi.org/10.1016/0018-506x(78)90024-7

cards.description: Neurologists have found that practicing TM natually both increases the levels of mood regulating hormones like serotonin and reduces the levels of stress-related hormones such as cortisol.
cards.title: Better Sleep Quality

definitions.value: The PTSD Checklist--Military Version (PCL-M; Weathers et al., 1993) was developed to assess the presence and severity of PTSD symptoms as defined by the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (4th ed.; DSM-IV; American Psychiatric Association, 1994) in military personnel.
Clinician Administered PTSD Scale - the gold standard in PTSD assessment used to make diagnosis of PTSD and assess it's symptoms over the past week.

Quality of Life Enjoyment and Satisfaction Questionnaire is a self-report measure designed to enable investigators to easily obtain sensitive measures of the degree of enjoyment and satisfaction experienced by subjects in various areas of daily functioning.
Clinitian's Global Inventory-Severity asks the clinician one question: “Considering your total clinical experience with this particular population, how mentally ill is the patient at this time?”

science.description: Transcendental Meditation® is one of the most thoroughly researched meditation techniques. Studies published in peer-reviewed journals have shown that TM is associated with:
science.title: Backed by Science

choice.title: Your Choice for a Better You

cta.action: Contact Dr. Grace Pei for Corporate Programs
cta.subtitle: Bring the benefits of Transcendental Meditation® to your organisation. Boost productivity, improve workplace relationships, and create a more resilient team.
cta.title: Transform Your Workplace

introduction.paragraph: Introduce your staff to the simple and elegant practice of TM. Watch workplace well-being and productivity soar as they become better equiped to deal with stress and difficult problems.
introduction.title: Workplace Transcendental Meditation®

keyFeatures.description: Transcendental Meditation® has been shown to reduce stress and increase emotional intelligence. In a corporate setting, this translates to improved interpersonal relationships. Employees who practice TM often report better communication with colleagues, increased empathy, and a more harmonious work environment. This can lead to more effective teamwork and a positive company culture.
keyFeatures.title: Improve workplace relations

keyFeatures.description: TM practice helps individuals become more self-aware and less reactive to stress. This increased self-awareness and calm can foster a more collaborative work environment. Employees are more likely to listen to each other's ideas, work together to solve problems, and support one another's efforts. This collaborative culture can drive innovation and improve overall company performance.
keyFeatures.title: Foster a culture of collaboration

keyFeatures.description: Regular TM practice has been linked to improved focus, creativity, and problem-solving skills. In the workplace, this can translate to increased productivity and efficiency. Additionally, as employees experience reduced stress and improved well-being, job satisfaction tends to increase. This can lead to higher employee retention rates and a more positive work environment overall.
keyFeatures.title: Boost productivity and job satisfaction

keyFeatures.description: Stress, anxiety, and burnout are significant concerns in many workplaces. Implementing a TM programme can serve as a preventative measure against these issues. Regular meditation practice has been shown to reduce symptoms of anxiety and depression, improve sleep quality, and increase resilience to stress. By providing employees with this powerful tool, companies can proactively support their workforce's mental health.
keyFeatures.title: Prevent workplace mental health issues

keyFeatures.description: Employees who practice TM often report feeling more engaged with their work and better able to handle workplace challenges. This increased resilience can be particularly valuable during times of change or high pressure. A team that is more engaged and resilient is likely to be more adaptable, innovative, and committed to achieving company goals.
keyFeatures.title: Create a more engaged and resilient team

chart.title: Effects of TM on Perceived Stress

citation.name: Elder, C., Nidich, S., Moriarty, F., & Nidich, R. (2014). Effect of transcendental meditation on employee stress, depression, and burnout: a randomized controlled study. The Permanente journal, 18(1), 19-23.

cards.description: TM significantly reduces stress over time. At 4 months, participants practicing TM reported a notable decrease in stress levels compared to a slight increase in the control group.
cards.title: Roll Back Stress

citation.name: Elder, C., Nidich, S., Moriarty, F., & Nidich, R. (2014). Effect of transcendental meditation on employee stress, depression, and burnout: a randomized controlled study. The Permanente journal, 18(1), 19-23.

cards.description: TM has a positive impact on the fight against depression. Participants who practiced TM experienced a significant reduction in their perceived levels of depression.
cards.title: Fight Depression

chart.title: TM practice and the Maslach Burnout Inventory

citation.name: Elder, C., Nidich, S., Moriarty, F., & Nidich, R. (2014). Effect of transcendental meditation on employee stress, depression, and burnout: a randomized controlled study. The Permanente journal, 18(1), 19-23.

cards.description: Participants practicing the TM technique over 4 months reduced their risk of burnout by decreasing their emotional exhaustion and increasing their sense of personal achievement.
cards.title: Prevent Burnout

corporateMeditation.subtitle: Let North Shore Meditation help you enhance the workplace well-being and productivity of your business with our corporate meditation program
corporateMeditation.title: Meditation Programs for Your Business

individualMeditation.subtitle: At North Shore Meditation, we offer a variety of different programs for learning and furthering your transcendental meditation® practice

cta.subtitle: Join our next Group Course and learn Transcendental Meditation® in a supportive environment. Spaces are limited, so reserve your spot today!
cta.title: Ready to Start Your TM Journey?

keyFeatures.description: Our Group Course is structured to provide a comprehensive introduction to Transcendental Meditation over four days. Each session is approximately two hours long, allowing for in-depth instruction and practice. This format ensures that you have time to absorb the teachings and gradually build your meditation practice.
keyFeatures.title: Four sessions totaling 8 hours over 4 days

keyFeatures.description: On the first day, you'll receive one-on-one instruction from a certified TM teacher. This personalised session allows the teacher to tailor the instruction to your specific needs and ensures that you learn the technique correctly from the start. You'll receive your personal mantra and learn how to use it effectively in your meditation practice.
keyFeatures.title: Day 1: Private session for learning the TM technique

keyFeatures.description: Following your personal instruction, you'll join a small group for the remaining three days. These sessions focus on deepening your understanding of the TM technique, refining your practice, and learning about the benefits of regular meditation. You'll have opportunities to meditate with the group, ask questions, and share experiences with fellow learners.
keyFeatures.title: Days 2-4: Group sessions to further practice and understanding

keyFeatures.description: We understand that everyone's schedule and preferences are different. That's why we offer both fully in-person courses and a hybrid model. The hybrid option combines in-center learning with online sessions via our app and Zoom. This flexibility allows you to choose the learning environment that best suits your needs while still receiving the full benefits of our Group Course.
keyFeatures.title: Offered fully in-person or as a hybrid model

keyFeatures.description: To accommodate various schedules, we offer our Group Courses on both weekends and weekdays. This allows you to choose a time that fits best with your work and personal commitments. Whether you prefer to learn over a long weekend or spread your sessions across weekday evenings, we have options to suit your lifestyle.
keyFeatures.title: Available on weekends and weekdays

tabs.subtitle: The recommended way of learning Transcendental Meditation®. Join a group of like-minded individuals and learn TM in a supportive group setting.
tabs.title: Group Meditation

cta.subtitle: Get on-on-one instruction tailored to your needs. Our Private Course offers the ultimate flexibility and personalised attention.
cta.title: Personalise Your TM Experience

keyFeatures.description: Our Private Course offers an exclusive, one-on-one learning experience over four consecutive days. This intensive format allows for a deep dive into the Transcendental Meditation® technique, with each session tailored specifically to your needs and progress. You'll receive undivided attention from your instructor throughout the course.
keyFeatures.title: Four consecutive days of private instruction totaling 8 hours over 4 days

keyFeatures.description: In the Private Course, your instructor will adapt the teaching style and pace to your individual learning preferences. This personalised approach ensures that you fully grasp each aspect of the TM technique. You'll have ample opportunity to ask questions, receive immediate feedback, and explore how TM can best integrate into your daily life.
keyFeatures.title: Tailored approach for a personalised experience

keyFeatures.description: While the first day of instruction typically takes place at our center, we offer flexibility for the locations of the following three days. This could mean continuing at the center, meeting in your home, or even in your office if that's more convenient. This flexibility allows you to learn in an environment where you feel most comfortable and relaxed.
keyFeatures.title: Flexible teaching locations for days 2-4

keyFeatures.description: The Private Course is perfect for individuals with busy or unpredictable schedules, as well as those who prefer or require more individualised attention. It's also an excellent option for those who may have specific questions or concerns about meditation, or who simply learn better in a one-on-one setting. This course ensures that you receive the most personalised and comprehensive introduction to Transcendental Meditation possible.
keyFeatures.title: Ideal for those with busy schedules or seeking individualised guidance

tabs.subtitle: Delve deeper into your practice by enroling into a personalised one-on-one Transcendental Meditation® course.
tabs.title: Private Meditation

cta.action: Enquire About the Next One Day Retreat
cta.subtitle: Join our One Day Meditation Retreat for an immersive experience. Enhance your practice, connect with other meditators, and find profound relaxation.
cta.title: Deepen Your TM Practice

keyFeatures.description: Start your day with gentle Maharishi Yoga Asanas and breathwork exercises. These practices are specifically designed to complement your TM practice, helping to prepare your body and mind for deeper meditation. The asanas focus on flexibility and balance, while the breathwork techniques help to calm the nervous system and increase mindfulness.
keyFeatures.title: Maharishi Yoga Asanas and breathwork

keyFeatures.description: Experience the power of meditating in a group setting. These sessions allow you to deepen your practice in a supportive environment. Many practitioners report that group meditation enhances their experience, leading to deeper states of relaxation and clearer thinking. You'll have multiple opportunities throughout the day to meditate with fellow TM practitioners.
keyFeatures.title: Group meditation sessions

keyFeatures.description: Benefit from group checking sessions led by an experienced TM teacher. These sessions provide an opportunity to refine your meditation technique, ask questions, and gain deeper insights into your practice. The teacher will guide you through the checking process, ensuring that you're practicing correctly and getting the most out of your meditation.
keyFeatures.title: Group checking with TM teacher

keyFeatures.description: Connect with like-minded individuals who share your interest in personal growth and meditation. The One Day Program provides ample opportunities for discussion, sharing experiences, and building relationships with fellow TM practitioners. This sense of community can be a valuable support system for your ongoing meditation practice.
keyFeatures.title: Opportunities for growth and community building

keyFeatures.description: The cumulative effect of a full day dedicated to TM practice and related activities is often a deep sense of relaxation and inner peace. Many participants report feeling refreshed, rejuvenated, and more in touch with themselves by the end of the program. This experience can provide a powerful reset and inspire you to maintain a consistent meditation practice in your daily life.
keyFeatures.title: Experience profound relaxation and inner peace

tabs.subtitle: Join North Shore Meditation for a day of guided meditation and exercises. Experience an immersive experience to enhance your Transcendental Meditation® practice.
tabs.title: One Day Meditation Retreat

individualMeditation.title: Meditation Programs for You

privacyNotice.intro: North Shore Meditation ("we", "us", or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Notice explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our website: https://northshoremeditation.au (the "Site").

sections.intro: When you use our "Contact Us" form, we collect the following Personally Identifiable Information (PII):
points: Any personal information you choose to include in your message to us
sections.title: Information We Collect

sections.intro: We only use your personal information for the following purposes:
points: To communicate with you regarding your inquiries or course information
To contact you regarding Transcendental Meditation® courses
To assist you with enroling into TM courses with Maharishi Foundation Australia
sections.title: How We Use Your Information

sections.intro: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes. However, we may share your information with:
points: Maharishi Foundation Australia for enrolment and course administration purposes (with your consent)
sections.title: Sharing Your Information

sections.footer: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at tm@northshoremeditation.au
points: Access the personal information we hold about you
Request corrections or updates to your personal information
Request the deletion of your personal information
sections.title: Your Data Rights

sections.intro: We may update this Privacy Notice from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.
sections.title: Changes to This Privacy Notice

steps.description: A certified TM teacher will guide you through the process in a series of sessions.
steps.title: Learn the technique

steps.description: Find a quiet place and sit in a comfortable position with your eyes closed.
steps.title: Sit comfortably

steps.description: Silently repeat a mantra that is carefuly selected for you by your TM teacher.
steps.title: Use your mantra

steps.description: Don't try to control or surpress your thoughts. Let them pass naturally.
steps.title: Let thoughts come and go

steps.description: There's no need to concentrate or try hard. The technique works effortlessly.
steps.title: Enjoy the process

steps.description: All it takes is 15-20 minutes twice a day
steps.title: Practice daily

cards.description: No need to control your mind or thoughts
cards.title: Effortless

cards.description: Works with your mind's natural tendencies
cards.title: Natural

cards.description: Backed by more than 250 independent universities and research institutions
cards.title: Effective

keyFeatures.title: Key Features of Transcendental Meditation®

paragraphs: Transcendental Meditation® (TM) is a simple, natural technique practiced for 15-20 minutes twice a day while sitting comfortably with your eyes closed. It's easy to learn and enjoyable to practice. It is not a religion, philosophy, or lifestyle.

Unlike other forms of meditation, TM does not involve concentration, control of the mind, or monitoring your thoughts. It's an effortless technique that allows your mind to settle inward, beyond thought, to experience the silent reservoir of energy, creativity, and intelligence found within everyone.
This state of restful alertness reduces stress, refreshes the mind, and provides a broad range of benefits for your mind, body, and behaviour.
whatIsTm.title: What is Transcendental Meditation®?

tm.subtitle: Explore the simplicity and power of a practice that requires no concentration, no control of the mind, and no monitoring of thoughts.
tm.title: Simplicity in it's Effortlessness

cards.a: The TM course is taught over four consecutive days, about 1-2 hours per day.
cards.q: How long does it take to learn TM?

cards.a: No, TM doesn't require any change in lifestyle, beliefs, or diet. It's a simple mental technique.
cards.q: Do I need to change my lifestyle to practice TM?

cards.a: TM is effortless and doesn't involve concentration or control of the mind. It's based on the natural tendency of the mind to move towards greater satisfaction.
cards.q: How is TM different from other meditation techniques?

cards.a: TM information sessions are always available online, and while it is possible to learn TM with a hybrid approach, in-person instruction is always recommended in order for you to get the best out of the learning experience.
For best results, practice TM for 15-20 minutes twice daily, once in the morning and once in the late afternoon or early evening.
cards.q: How often should I practice TM?

steps.description: Take your first step by attending a group info session to learn about the TM technique from a certified TM instructor.
steps.title: Attend a Free Info Session

steps.description: Learn the TM technique with the guidance of a certified TM instructor. They provide you with the support you need so you can get the most out of practicing Transcendental Meditation®.
steps.title: Unlock the TM Technique

steps.description: We are committed to providing support and guidance whenever you need it. Reach out anytime to learn about personal one-on-one check-ins of your TM practice, group meditation sessions, TM refresher courses, and more.
steps.title: A Lifetime of Support

way.subtitle: Allow our certified Transcendental Meditation® teachers to personally guide you on your journey of learning the TM technique.
way.title: Uncover Your Way of Practicing Transcendental Meditation®

hero.author: - Maharashi Maheshi Yogi -
hero.subtitle: Discover the power of Transcendental Meditation® at North Shore Meditation
hero.title: Success in Anything is Through Happiness

paragraphs: A customer once told Grace that "meditation is a very personal thing". We understand that. We are attentive to your needs in understanding and developing the habits for this simple and natural technique.
Grace has been certified to teach Transcendental Meditation® by the Maharishi Vedic University, and is authorised by the Maharishi Foundation Australia to teach TM at North Shore Meditation.
learnFromGrace.title: Begin your journey at North Shore Meditation with Grace

cards.description: Transcendental Meditation® helps you tap into a deep sense of calm and inner contentment. By quieting the mind and letting go of external distractions, you can experience a profound state of peace and lasting happiness from within.
cards.title: Discover Inner Peace and Joy

cards.description: Life's challenges become more manageable when you develop a strong foundation of resilience. Through regular practice of transcendental meditation, you cultivate the mental strength and emotional balance to stay grounded and composed, even in the face of adversity.
cards.title: Build Resilience from Within

cards.description: A calm and centered mind naturally improves the quality of your interactions with others. Transcendental Meditation® helps reduce reactive tendencies and promotes greater empathy, patience, and understanding, leading to deeper, more fulfilling relationships.
cards.title: Enhance Your Relationships

cards.description: In a fast-paced world, stress and anxiety are common challenges. Transcendental Meditation® offers a scientifically proven way to calm the nervous system, lower cortisol levels, and bring a sense of ease and relaxation into your daily life.
cards.title: Relieve Stress and Anxiety

cards.description: Creativity flourishes when the mind is free from distractions and mental blocks. Transcendental Meditation® encourages a state of relaxed alertness, allowing ideas to flow more freely and enabling you to tap into your natural creative potential.
cards.title: Expand Your Creative Potential

cards.description: A clear and focused mind is key to excelling in academics. By reducing mental clutter and enhancing cognitive functioning, Transcendental Meditation® sharpens your concentration, improves memory, and boosts your ability to learn and retain information.
cards.title: Achieve Academic Excellence

cards.description: Regular practice of Transcendental Meditation® supports better mental health by reducing symptoms of depression, anxiety, and burnout. It fosters emotional stability, self-awareness, and a balanced outlook on life, promoting long-term psychological well-being.
cards.title: Nurture Mental Health and Well-being
